amendment.description: To protect the American people and strengthen our national security by fully funding the Biomedical Advanced Research and Development Authority (BARDA) and the BioShield Special Reserve Fund.

vote.text: Amendment SA 232 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 232 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Burr.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 232 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 232 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Burr.
